summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated August 9, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, and leave statuses for correctional officers and other personnel. The document includes numerous staff names and assignment changes, reflecting the operational staffing on that specific date.

keyFacts: The document is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, for Friday, August 9, 2019.
It lists numerous correctional officer posts (e.g., SHU, CONTROL, INTERNAL, LOBBY, ESCORT) and tracks staff assignments, shift changes, and leave statuses (Sick Leave, Annual Leave, AWOL).
The roster includes specific staff names like Marrugo, J; Thomas, I; Noel, T; and Albanese, P, showing the operational staffing on that date.
The document reflects standard prison administrative operations, with no direct mention of Jeffrey Epstein or any specific inmates.
